query:
CREATE TABLE moments (
	id varchar(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	tenantId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	threadId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	personId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	source text NOT NULL,
	type enum('email_sent','email_received','reply_received','call_completed','meeting_held','note_added','signal_detected','lead_captured') NOT NULL,
	timestamp timestamp NOT NULL,
	metadata json,
	createdAt timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2QkRhwd4AVTLhHG.a0950ca1ba2f --database TQEsx2HByTQrcAiUBn2kww --execute CREATE TABLE moments (
	id varchar(36) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	tenantId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	threadId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	personId varchar(36) NOT NULL,
	source text NOT NULL,
	type enum('email_sent','email_received','reply_received','call_completed','meeting_held','note_added','signal_detected','lead_captured') NOT NULL,
	timestamp timestamp NOT NULL,
	metadata json,
	createdAt timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
